name: Halong bay 2 days 1 night - Grayline cruise
description: Embark at Tuan Chau Marina, enjoy free tea at Gray Line private reception roomVisit to less-touristic places and experience the longest route and cruising time; ALMOST 24 hours on the BaySwim and conquer the panoramic peak at Titop IslandGo kayaking at Luon cave in off-peak time and admire the serenity of escapeExplore Maze Cave – one of the little-known caves in Halong located at a very peaceful island Enjoy dinner with BBQ seafood in cozy and romantic ambienceStay overnight at the quietest area in Halong Bay
